GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
soc: amlogic: Fix refcount leak in meson-secure-pwrc.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit f370fbbd3151c1c87d1e976c8964cb6cc46f2e00, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit b3dde5013e13d44799b3477cd0bf0c9ad34fe5e9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: soc: amlogic: Fix refcount leak in meson-secure-pwrc.c
